```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(ggplot2)
data(congress_age)
```

```{r}
congress_age %>%
  mutate(year = format(termstart, "%Y")) %>%
  filter(party %in% c("R", "D")) %>%
  group_by(party, year) %>%
  summarize(mean_age = mean(age)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = mean_age, group = party, color = party)) + geom_line() + scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red")) + labs(title = "Average Age of Members of Congress", subtitle = "At start of term 1947-2013", x = "Year", y = "Average Age" ) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```
